entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 8. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 28 March 2023
